Source.Name: libultrahdr
Source.Summary: Image compression library that uses gain map technology to store and distribute HDR images
Source.Description: libultrahdr is the reference codec for the Ultra HDR format. Ultra HDR is a true HDR image format, and is backcompatible. The codecs that support the format can render the HDR intent of the image on HDR displays; other codecs can still decode and display the SDR intent of the image.
